crystals.name: Amethyst
crystals.description: A purple variety of quartz that is highly prized for its calming and protective energies. It is known to help with stress relief, spiritual growth, and enhancing intuition.
affirmations: I am protected by divine light
My intuition guides me clearly
I release all that no longer serves me
usageInstructions: Place under pillow for peaceful sleep and dream recall
Wear as jewelry to maintain spiritual protection throughout the day
Hold during meditation to enhance spiritual awareness
Place in bedroom corners to create calming energy
Carry in pocket to reduce stress and anxiety
Place on desk or workspace to improve mental clarity
Use in crystal grids for protection and spiritual growth
